From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia


Indian horror film


Kaali KhuhiDirected byTerrie SamundraWritten byTerrie SamundraDavid Walter LechRupinder InderjitProduced byRamon ChibbAnku PandeStarring
Shabana Azmi
Sanjeeda Sheikh
Riva Arora
Satyadeep Mishra
Leela Samson
CinematographySejal ShahEdited bySanyukta KazaMusic byDaniel B.GeorgeProductioncompanyManomay Motion PictureDistributed byNetflixRelease date
30 October 2020 (2020-10-30)
CountryIndiaLanguageHindi
Kaali Khuhi is an Indian Hindi-language Horror film directed by Terrie Samundra, written by Terrie Samundra and David Walter Lech and starring Shabana Azmi,[1] Sanjeeda Sheikh, Riva Arora and Satyadeep Mishra.[2][3][4] The plot revolves around the girl Shivangi who is 10 years old who is trying to save the village where her family resides from ghosts.


Cast[edit]
Shabana Azmi[5] as Satya Maasi
Sanjeeda Sheikh as Priya
Riva Arora as Shivangi[citation needed]
Satyadeep Mishra as Darshan
Leela Samson as Dadi
Hetvi Bhanushali
Rose Rathore
Samuel John
Pooja Sharma as Young Satya
Jatinder Kaur
Sukhwinder Virk
Tejinder Kour
Amita Sharma as Young Dadi
Satnam Singh
Chand Rani
Release[edit]
The film was released on October 30, 2020.

References[edit]


^ "Kaali Khuhi Trailer: On Child Murder and Karma". Al Khaleej Today. 16 October 2020.

^ "Kaali Khuhi trailer: Of female infanticide and karma". The Indian Express. 16 October 2020.

^ "Kaali Khuhi teaser: Netflix India's Halloween treat mines horrors of Punjab's past. Watch". Hindustan Times. 5 October 2020.

^ "'Kaali Khuhi' trailer out: Shabana Azmi starrer promises horror fans edge-of-the-seat suspense thriller". DNA India. 17 October 2020.

^ "Shabana Azmi, Sanjeeda Shaikh, Satyadeep Mishra star in Netflix's thriller drama Kaali Khuhi, watch trailer". Bollywood Hungama. 16 October 2020.
